direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the ComparatorChain by adding or replacing a Comparator, and handle the sort order similarly.
Both methods involve modifying the sort order of the ComparatorChain, though setForwardSort only changes the order to forward.
Both methods involve modifying the sort order of the ComparatorChain, though setReverseSort only changes the order to reverse.
Both methods check if the ComparatorChain is locked before performing modifications, throwing an exception if it is.
The addComparator method indirectly affects the compare method by modifying the chain of comparators that the compare method uses.
